message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $130. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but $130 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway on this last offer, so I'll go with $127.50. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're really close to your target price, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $129. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?
